name: Merge Bistro
storyline: Travel to exotic locations, meet interesting characters, and explore the world of Merge Bistro! Discover unique ingredients that will take your cooking to the next level and build your business as you encounter friendly and fierce competitors who will either help or hinder your success. Can you rise to the challenge and become the top chef in the world?
summary: Are you ready to become the ultimate culinary mastermind? Then step into the world of Merge Bistro, where you’ll create mouth-watering dishes by merging different elements and running your very own restaurant!
